channel.title: Page on Fritz
channel.description: Recent content in Page on Fritz

item.title: Experience
item.description: Work November Five Senior React Developer Sep 2020 - Present We leave our clients with more than products. By building meaningful relations throughout their organisation, we transform them from within and ensure we live and breathe digital together. As a frontend React developer I transform the designs to a fully functional application. I think critical about how components should hook together and keep them easy to understand.

item.title: Hello :wave:,
item.description: My name is Jan Stevens. I'm a full stack developer based in Antwerp. I'm fascinated by technology and finding solutions for complex problems. I've build software in React / Rails / Ruby / Postgres / GraphQL / Elixir. I'm a jack of all trades that easily picks up new technology and successfully applies it in production. From building full stack applications to cross compiling Android for ARM Point of Sales devices.
